tool.name: SAGA.pj_proj4.25
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayCRS_FILE False isArraySOURCE True output_data_TARGET $output_data_TARGET name SAGA.pj_proj4.25 CRS_METHOD $CRS_METHOD CRS_PROJ4 '$CRS_PROJ4' CRS_FILE $CRS_FILE CRS_EPSG $CRS_EPSG CRS_EPSG_AUTH '$CRS_EPSG_AUTH' CRS_EPSG_GEOGCS '$CRS_EPSG_GEOGCS' CRS_EPSG_PROJCS '$CRS_EPSG_PROJCS' PRECISE $PRECISE SOURCE $SOURCE TRANSFORM_Z $TRANSFORM_Z COPY $COPY UTM_ZONE $UTM_ZONE UTM_SOUTH $UTM_SOUTH prefer $prefer response $response outputType_TARGET $OutputSection_TARGET.outputType_TARGET transmissionMode_TARGET $OutputSection_TARGET.transmissionMode_TARGET

param.name: CRS_FILE
param.label: Well Known Text File
param.help: Well Known Text File The following data types are allowed in the txt file: plain

param.name: PRECISE
param.label: Precise Datum Conversion
param.help: avoids precision problems when source and target crs use different geodedtic datums.

param.name: SOURCE
param.label: Source
param.help: Source The following data types are allowed in the txt file: json, xml, vnd.google-earth.kml+xml

param.name: COPY
param.label: Copy
param.help: If set the projected data will be created as a copy of the orignal, if not vertices will be projected in place thus reducing memory requirements.

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_TARGET
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

tool.help: Project shapes into UTM coordinates.<br/>Projection routines make use of the Proj.4 Cartographic Projections library.<br/>Proj.4 was originally developed by Gerald Evenden and later continued by the United States Department of the Interior, Geological Survey (USGS).<br/>Proj.4 Version is Rel. 5.2.0, September 15th, 2018<br/><a target="_blank" href="http://trac.osgeo.org/proj/">Proj.4 Homepage</a>
